attendeeContainer.atleastOneNotAvailable: Atleast one attendee is not available

email.detailDescription: Default template for emails. It will fill the subject with an issue's summary.

meetings.detailDescription: Default template for meetings. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.

chat.detailDescription: Default template for chats. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.

commentVisibility.choose: Choose if a comment should be added to the issue
commentVisibility.tooltipExplanation: Choose if a comment should be added

sendbutton.label: Send
sendbutton.sendMeetingTooltip: Send an Outlook meeting request to all attendees and - if selected - add an issue comment with the meeting details (Ctrl+Enter)

templatePicker.noTemplatesGlobalAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates in the global app settings or project settings.
templatePicker.noTemplatesProjectAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates for your project in the project settings.

createOutlookMeetingScreenModel.meetingCreatedFlagBody: The meeting has been scheduled and all participants have received their invite.
createOutlookMeetingScreenModel.errorSavingIssuePropertyFlagBody: It seems like you do not have the permissions to edit this issue.
createOutlookMeetingScreenModel.errorLoadingEventBody: Could not load event before editing. It might have been deleted

officeLoginScreen.heading: Welcome to {{ appName }}
officeLoginScreen.description: Looks like you're using the app for the first time. Please log in with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!

sharingChooser.publicDescription: All users can join the meeting
sharingChooser.chooseMeetingPermissions: Choose who should have access to this meeting

warnings.privateMeetingIsSharedWarning: Are you sure that you want to share a private meeting?

meetingSuggestionContainer.noSuggestionsAttendeesUnavailable: In the given time range there are too few attendees available. Please select a different time range to load more suggestions
meetingSuggestionContainer.noSuggestionsAttendeesUnavailableOrUnkno: We could not determine the availabilities for some users and in total to few attendees are available. Please select a different time range
meetingSuggestionContainer.noSuggestionsOrganizerUnavailable: You are not available in the given time range. Please select a different time range to load more suggestions
meetingSuggestionContainer.alldayDisabled: Meeting time suggestions not available for allday events
